IAmCreativeProactive: I am a creative and proactive web developer currently living in
paragraph1: I am a web developer passionate about technology, with experience in front-end, back-end and databases, working in the complete cycle of application development. I master tools such as Angular, React, Python, C#, and WordPress, and I constantly seek to improve my skills to deliver efficient and high-quality solutions that meet the needs of customers and users.
text-services-1: I develop elegant, intuitive interfaces that are adaptable to any device, focused on usability, performance and visual impact to achieve real results.
text-services-2: I develop elegant, functional and adaptable websites, focused on usability, performance and visual impact to deliver real results.
text-services-3: I create efficient and well-structured codes for modern and functional interfaces on the front-end, as well as robust and high-performance solutions on the back-end.
